==============
{data-height=600}
------------------
### Crypto Volume

```{r - Volume Graph}
crypto.bar <- plot_ly(
  x = coin_history$name,
  y = coin_history$volume,
  name = "Cryptos",
  type = "bar"
)

crypto.bar
```
{data-height=600}
------------------
### Bitcoin Graph

```{r Bitcoin Graph}
fig <- plot_ly(bitcoin.history, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines')%>%
  add_trace(x = ~timestamp, y = ~open)%>%
  layout(showlegend = F)

fig <- fig %>%
  layout(
         xaxis = list(zerolinecolor = '#ffff',
                      zerolinewidth = 2,
                      gridcolor = 'ffff'),
         yaxis = list(zerolinecolor = '#ffff',
                      zerolinewidth = 2,
                      gridcolor = 'ffff'),
         plot_bgcolor='#e5ecf6', width = 1000)


fig
```
{data-height=600}
------------------
